content: lion brand pattern # chs-beretandscarf corrections applied jul 17 2004 skill level easy level 2 size one size **hat ** one size fits most 10 inches diameter/32 inches circumference **scarf ** measures 8 inches x 96 inches unfinished homespun® article #790 4 balls *barrington* *materials are sufficient to make the set * *hat requires 1 skein scarf requires 3 skeins * crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm hat is worked in the round from the top down ribbing is worked in row add top knot to finish scarf is worked flat in 1-row pattern laying scarf flat fold up 8 inches on each end to form pocket sew sides in place invisibly to finish see also beret & scarf knit 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/beret--scarf-knit
